title: Can you still earn a living with selling beats on BeatStars, or is the market oversaturated? - Quora

response.answer_text: Realistically there is only a small number of people that acutally make a decent amount while the average is barley scraping by. Selling beats online is considered passive income, not something you should rely on as your main source of income. It's not a smart move to quit your day job as there are people out there making those stupid mistakes which is not a stable source of income. You have no control of how much you would make as it’s like a rollercoaster. You could go weeks or months without any sales or make make some here and there. Passive income should only be considered a 2nd source of income as smart people generally have multiple sources of income generally both Active income combined with passive income. So if you are going to sell beats online, I highly advise to have some sort of Active income such as your day job or start your own business or be a freelancer. Get into Recording, Mixing and Mastering. Learn how to network and build relationships with Artists in your local market and get in the studio with that artist and start producing records from top to bottom if you are going to call yourself a Producer.

Very rarely do producers make a decent income selling beats on beat selling websites like Beatstars, It is such a competitive market and is indeed highly saturated to where you are likely to only make a few dollars if you are lucky. Your quality of music and skill as a producer are important factors but the saturated market overrides that to a significant degree.

I don’t sell beats but I’ll tell you if they’re 🔥 then you are good! I don’t care how saturated the market is, if the quality of your work is on point then you will be fine as long as you promote yourself! Don’t think they’ll do all the work it doesn’t matter what you’re selling you have to market it

Over saturation is an issue in almost every industry in today’s age. What will make you successful selling beats or music online is to be resilient, consistent, hardworking and networking. You HAVE to market otherwise, your product just sits stagnant on the shelf.

Nah Beatstars will only earn you income if you’ve been on there for awhile. Beatstars also has so many downsides and time consuming things to do just to upload a track. I’ve made all my money of just simple IG transactions
